title: pAlayamAm siddhivinAyakam
sahitya:
pAlayamAm siddhivinAyaka kAmitArtha pradAyaka shritajanapAlaka


anupallavi

  phala netra kumAra sahOdara bAlarUpa shrIkara jitakumAra sudhIra
				(ciTTasvara)
p,mp, g,mpnp, m,gs mnpm p,ns m,gs sgn nsp pnm mgs


caraNam 1    pArvatI vAmadEvankasthita munijana bhavita mUshaka gamana sumana uragarashana
				(ciTTasvara)
ppn mpn,, snpmg nsgmp, | spm,pm,g mnp,np,m,pns | nsg sm,gs psn,np spm,gs
gajamukha agajAmukha kumuda rajanIsha dhAritanaya vinAyaka gaNanAyaka varadAyaka
				(ciTTasvaras)
sp,, pnmp gm sgmp gmp,,, | ns,, sgnspn snpm psn,,, | sggs nspns, pnnp mp gmp, | gmp gmpn s,,np m,,g nsgm ||
    caraNam 2    sadAshivakavi bhava sankataharana sadA sujana vinuta pankaja caraNa
suragaNa bhayaharaNa rAvana madaharana durita vighna nivAraNa vAranNa vadana
